contact.subtitle_faq: Find answers to common questions here

faq.1: How do I search for flights on TICKETS.AR?
faq.1_answer: Simply enter your departure and destination cities along with your travel dates. Our system will compare options from top airlines to bring you the best deals available.
faq.2: What information do I need to book a flight?
faq.2_answer: Provide your departure location, destination, travel dates, and traveler details. Once you choose a flight, you’ll be redirected to complete the booking with our partner airline or provider.
faq.3: Are there any additional fees or hidden costs?
faq.3_answer: We display upfront prices from our partners. Any extra fees, such as features or luggage costs, will be shown on the partner's final checkout page.
faq.4: Can I cancel or change my flight after booking?
faq.4_answer: Cancellations or changes depend on the airline's policy. Review their terms and conditions for details on fees and processes.
faq.5_answer: Payments are processed by our travel partners. Most accept credit cards, and some offer other options such as PayPal or online wallets.
faq.6: Can I book hotels or car rentals on TICKETS.AR?
faq.6_answer: Yes, you can view hotel and car rental options provided by our partners to complete your travel arrangements.
faq.7: How will I receive my booking confirmation?
faq.7_answer: Once you’ve completed your booking, a confirmation email with your ticket details will be sent directly to your provided email address.
faq.8: What should I do if my flight is delayed or canceled?
faq.8_answer: If your flight is delayed or canceled, contact the airline directly. They will provide assistance and any rebooking options if available.
faq.9: Does TICKETS.AR offer loyalty programs or discounts for frequent travelers?
faq.9_answer: While we don’t have our own loyalty program, many airlines offer frequent flyer rewards. Check each airline's loyalty options when booking.
faq.10: Do I need to create an account to book a flight?
faq.10_answer: No account is needed with us, but some of our partners may require one for booking and managing your tickets.
faq.11: What is my baggage allowance for flights?
faq.11_answer: Baggage allowances vary by airline and fare type. Check the baggage policy details during the booking process.
faq.12: Who should I contact if I need help during my trip?
faq.12_answer: For any issues during your trip, contact the airline or provider directly. Their contact details will be included in your booking confirmation.
faq.13: Are there travel restrictions or visa requirements?
faq.13_answer: Always check travel restrictions and visa requirements for your destination with official sources before booking. TICKETS.AR does not provide this information.
faq.14: Can I select my seat when booking a flight?
faq.14_answer: Seat selection availability depends on the airline. You’ll see options during the booking process if the airline allows seat selection.
faq.15: What health and safety measures are in place for flights?
faq.15_answer: Each airline has its own health protocols. You can find details on their safety measures when completing your booking.
faq.16: Are there any special deals or promotions on flights?
faq.16_answer: Yes! We feature the latest promotions and discounts from our partners. Visit our site regularly to catch current deals.
faq.17: When is the best time to book flights for the lowest prices?
faq.17_answer: Flight prices can fluctuate, so we recommend booking in advance and monitoring fares to find the best deal for your trip.
faq.18_answer: Some of our partners provide travel insurance options. Review the choices available at checkout for added peace of mind.
faq.19: What identification do I need for international travel?
faq.19_answer: Check the official entry requirements of your destination country to ensure you have the correct visa and identification.
faq.20: How can I check my flight status?
faq.20_answer: Visit the airline’s website or use their app to monitor your flight status, or contact their customer service team for real-time updates.
